review_body: Really a great app. I've been using this for over 2 years now. I've made over 10 booking on this app and I've never had any major inconvenience except one time, however the issue was with the bus operators and the RedBus team was very helpful and provided me with a quick resolution. Thankyou team Re...Full ReviewReally a great app. I've been using this for over 2 years now. I've made over 10 booking on this app and I've never had any major inconvenience except one time, however the issue was with the bus operators and the RedBus team was very helpful and provided me with a quick resolution. Thankyou team RedBus.

Comfort & Ease of travelling in busses. Best option to find the perfect journey plan. You can actually see Tickets price range, busses photos, consumers feedback-ratings-past experiences. Best option to find the perfect journey plan. You can actually see Tickets price range, busses photos, consumers feedback-ratings-past experiences. You may judge be yourself the best bus to travel. Also through this app the bus operator would also come to know why people ignored their fleets on this route.

The worst app I have ever used. My bus got cancelled 2 times and I am not getting any refund as the they refuse to believe the bus was cancelled. This is not a proper system. My bus got cancelled 2 times and I am not getting any refund as the they refuse to believe the bus was cancelled. This is not a proper system. I had already paid for it and now the authority says that the bus wasn't cancelled and I should contact the bus operator. And the bus operator says Red bus is responsible. I would never recommend it. The worst app ever!
